subdisciplines.name: Memoir
subdisciplines.description: A subgenre of creative nonfiction in which the author writes about their own personal experiences.

subdisciplines.name: Personal essay
subdisciplines.description: A subgenre of creative nonfiction in which the author writes about their own personal experiences or observations.

subdisciplines.name: Literary journalism
subdisciplines.description: A subgenre of creative nonfiction that combines elements of journalism with the techniques of creative writing.
